attributes.action: reverse the smoking ban in pubs and live music venues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pubs are losing trade. Non-smokers are forced to stand outside with smokers. Attendance of live music concerts is now erratic due to smokers having to go outside. The majority of the people of England do not want this ban. People are rather staying at home and smoking in the warm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
